step1.para: Place the larger low range synchronizer on a bench and install the sliding clutch on blocker pins, recessed side up ( Figure 320).

figure.caption: Figure 319. Install Sliding Clutch on Blocker Pins

step1.para: Install the three springs in the bores of the high range synchronizer ring ( Figure 321).

figure.caption: Figure 320. Install Springs in Bores of High Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Place the high range synchronizer ring over the blocker pins of the low range synchronizer, seating the springs against the pins ( Figure 322).

figure.caption: Figure 321. Place High Range Synchronizer Ring Over Blocker Pins of Low Range Synchronizer

step1.para: Apply downward pressure to the high range synchronizer ring WHILE TWISTING COUNTERCLOCKWISE to compress the springs and fully seat the ring on the blocker pins of the low range synchronizer ( Figure 323).

figure.caption: Figure 322. Apply Downward Pressure to High Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Spread the countershaft assemblies with the splitter gear set remaining in time and install the synchronizer assembly on the splines of the range mainshaft, low range ring in the recess of the low range gear ( Figure 324).

figure.caption: Figure 323. Install Synchronizer Assembly on Splines of Range Mainshaft
